REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1929 reute h f BC-<MERIDIAN-ENERGY>,-CA 03-26 0045

TEXT.TITLE: <MERIDIAN ENERGY>, CASTONE END LETTER OF INTENT
TEXT.BODY: <Meridian Energy Inc> and Castone Development Corp, a privately-held company, jointly announced that they have decided to terminate the letter of intent under which Meridian would have acquired Castone. Reuter
